name: VBee
description:
VBee is a leading company specializing in text-to-speech (TTS) technology in Vietnam. Our output voice is natural, and can be customized by age, gender and region. We are currently developing applications using TTS technologies, such as a virtual assistant, an audio book converting tool, and an audio news service.

Founded by a team of experts from leading universities in Vietnam with a great deal of experience in the field, we are working to bring you products and solutions of outstanding quality.
